summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Pagination and File Attachments features. All backend API tests passed (17/17). Frontend E2E tests verified: pagination controls work correctly (top and bottom), per-page selector changes items displayed, page navigation works, file upload/download/delete functionality works properly.
critical_code_review_comments: Pagination implementation is solid - Backend correctly returns pagination metadata with cases
Frontend Cases.jsx correctly displays pagination controls at top and bottom
Per-page selector (5, 10, 20, 50) works correctly and resets to page 1 on change
Attachments section in CaseDetails.jsx has proper drag-and-drop upload area
File upload validates file size (10MB max) and file types correctly
Download and delete buttons have proper data-testid attributes for testing
seed_data_creation: Created and cleaned up test attachments during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Pagination and Attachments features are fully functional. Pagination: GET /api/cases?page=X&per_page=Y returns {cases: [], pagination: {page, per_page, total, total_pages}}. Attachments: POST /api/cases/{id}/attachments for upload, DELETE /api/cases/{id}/attachments/{att_id} for delete. Files served via /api/uploads/

features_tested.pagination_controls_top: PASSED - Shows 'Mostrando X - Y de Z chamados', per-page selector, Anterior/Próxima buttons
features_tested.pagination_controls_bottom: PASSED - Shows page number buttons (1, 2, 3...), Primeira/Última buttons
features_tested.pagination_navigation: PASSED - Next/Previous buttons navigate correctly between pages
features_tested.per_page_selector: PASSED - Changing items per page (5, 10, 20, 50) works correctly
features_tested.pagination_counter: PASSED - Counter shows correct range (e.g., 'Mostrando 1-10 de 94')
features_tested.attachments_section: PASSED - Section appears in CaseDetails with paperclip icon and counter
features_tested.file_upload: PASSED - Drag-and-drop area works, files upload successfully with toast notification
features_tested.file_download: PASSED - Download button opens file in new tab
features_tested.file_delete: PASSED - Delete button removes attachment with confirmation
features_tested.attachment_metadata: PASSED - Shows filename, size, uploader name correctly
features_tested.file_type_validation: PASSED - Invalid file types (.exe) are rejected
